name: Toyoko Inn Yamanotesen Otsuka-eki Kita-guchi No.2

reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights. Location was great. Less than 5 minutes walk from the JR Station with loads of cheap restaurants along the way. It was a pleasant walk even at night. The hotel is located slightly off the main thoroughfare. Thus, it was nice to sit outside by their outdoor tables since it was very peaceful.
reviews.title: Excellent Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a Double Room and not the Economy Double. Thus, slightly bigger room and the bed was slightly bigger than a queen sized bed. Therefore, a good size for friends sharing. As mentioned, the bed was higher than usual to accommodate luggages being stored underneath.
reviews.title: Good value
Great Budget Hotel
reviews.text: After staying in both twin and double rooms I prefer the double since there is more space. What I love about Toyoko Inn is the abundance of places to hang wet clothing to dry in the bathroom.

aka: Toyoko Inn Yamanotesen Otsuka-Eki Kita-Guchi No.2 Tokyo, Japan
